body:
Hey man! I'm working on that and there are solutions but I didn't implement then yet. I want to make sure it will be no security issues for the users. You can check it here:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/194#issuecommen...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/194#issuecomment-63257133)



PS: Thanksgiving is coming which means I will get some real development time. ;) Stay warm!
